Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV13itu.abstract: The iTunes store id of the app (if the app is available on the App Store or Mac App Store).

Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV7vers.name: version
Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV7vers.abstract: The version of the app (corresponding to the CFBundleVersion entry in the app’s Info.plist).

Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV14man.name: managedConfigs
Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV14man.abstract: Managed app configuration associated with the app.

Structs/App/ManagedConfig.html.name: ManagedConfig
Structs/App/ManagedConfig.html.abstract: A managed app configuration (a key-value pair) associated with an App.

Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV12end.name: endpointName
Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV12end.abstract: The remote API endpoint identifying this resource.

Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV4from.name: init(from:)
Structs/App.html#/s:9SimpleMDM3AppV4from.abstract: Creates a new instance of the resource by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Account.html#/s:9SimpleMDM7Accou.name: appleStoreCountryCode
Structs/Account.html#/s:9SimpleMDM7Accou.abstract: The app store country that SimpleMDM uses for the account (in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format).

Structs/Account.html#/s:9SimpleMDM7Accou.name: endpointName
Structs/Account.html#/s:9SimpleMDM7Accou.abstract: The remote API endpoint identifying this resource.

Structs/Account.html#/s:9SimpleMDM7Accou.name: init(from:)
Structs/Account.html#/s:9SimpleMDM7Accou.abstract: Creates a new instance of the resource by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/App.html.name: App
Structs/App.html.abstract: An App represents an app in your app catalog. You can use AppGroup to install apps to your devices.

Structs/AppGroup.html.name: AppGroup
Structs/AppGroup.html.abstract: An app group is an object that pairs App resources with DeviceGroup resources for the purpose of pushing apps

Structs/CustomConfigurationProfile.html.name: CustomConfigurationProfile
Structs/CustomConfigurationProfile.html.abstract: A custom configuration profile created with AppleConfiguration and applied to devices.

Structs/Device.html.name: Device
Structs/Device.html.abstract: A device registered in your SimpleMDM account.

Structs/DeviceGroup.html.name: DeviceGroup
Structs/DeviceGroup.html.abstract: A group of device, used to assign apps and profiles to devices.

Structs/InstalledApp.html.name: InstalledApp
Structs/InstalledApp.html.abstract: A representation of an app installation on a device.

Structs/PushCertificate.html.name: PushCertificate
Structs/PushCertificate.html.abstract: The Apple push certificate used by SimpleMDM to push configuration update to your devices.

Protocols/Resource.html.name: Resource
Protocols/Resource.html.abstract: A protocol adopted by all resources types of the library.

Classes/SimpleMDM.html.name: SimpleMDM
Classes/SimpleMDM.html.abstract: The main static object representing the SimpleMDM API. Use this to set your private API key.
